item.title: Local transaction
item.description: Function Fully support none-cross-database transactions, for example, table sharding only or database sharding with route result in the single database. Fully support cross-database transactions caused by logic exceptions, for example, the update of two databases in one transaction. After the update, the null cursor is thrown and the content in both databases can be rolled back. Do not support the cross-database transactions caused by network or hardware exceptions.

item.title: BASE Transaction
item.description: Function Fully support cross-database transactions. Use Servicecomb-Saga. Support reverted SQL, auto-generation of update snapshot and auto-compensation. Supported Will support at 4.0.0
